Package org.restlet.ext.javamail

Integration with JavaMail 1.4 (POP3 and SMTP clients).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JavaMailClientHelper Client connector to a mail server.
JavaMailConverter A JavaMail converter helper to convert from Message objects to MessageRepresentation.
MailResolver Basic resolver that exposes several data from a given mail.
MessageRepresentation XML representation of a JavaMail message.
MessagesRepresentation XML representation of a list of JavaMail messages.
RepresentationMessage JavaMail MIME message based on an XML representation.
TriggerResource Resource that handles requests to target resources according to parameters located in mails.
 

Package org.restlet.ext.javamail Description

Integration with JavaMail 1.4 (POP3 and SMTP clients). JavaMail provides a platform-independent and protocol-independent framework to build mail and messaging applications.

Since:
Restlet 1.0
See Also:
JavaMail product page
